Anchor.name: --anchor-text-decoration
Anchor.description: Controls the text-decoration value for when the link is not hovered.

Anchor.name: --anchor-hover-text-decoration
Anchor.description: Controls the text-decoration value for when the link is hovered.

Anchor.name: current
Anchor.description: Changes the aria-current attribute, telling screen readers how to handle the link.

Anchor.name: disabled
Anchor.description: Changes the aria-disabled attribute, telling screen readers how to handle the link and altering it to be greyed-out.

Anchor.name: href
Anchor.description: Changes the URL that Anchor navigates end-users to when clicked.

Anchor.name: download
Anchor.description: If linking to a downloadable file, this property will be used as the suggested file name.

Anchor.name: rel
Anchor.description: Sets how the Anchor relates to the current page, see MDN for more information.

Anchor.name: target
Anchor.description: Sets the target of the Anchor being navigated, see MDN for more information.

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {Anchor} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Anchor
    href="https://google.com"
    target="_blank"
    rel="noopener noreferrer"
>
    Goto google.com
</Anchor>

snippets.title: Anchor External Navigation

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {Anchor, Stack} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Stack
    orientation="horizontal"
    spacing="medium"
    variation="wrap"
>
    <Anchor
        href="https://google.com"
        target="_blank"
        rel="noopener noreferrer"
    >
        Goto google.com DEFAULT
    </Anchor>

    <Anchor
        href="https://google.com"
        target="_blank"
        rel="noopener noreferrer"
        palette="accent"
    >
        Goto google.com ACCENT
    </Anchor>

    <Anchor
        href="https://google.com"
        target="_blank"
        rel="noopener noreferrer"
        palette="dark"
    >
        Goto google.com DARK
    </Anchor>

    <Anchor
        href="https://google.com"
        target="_blank"
        rel="noopener noreferrer"
        palette="light"
    >
        Goto google.com LIGHT
    </Anchor>

    <Anchor
        href="https://google.com"
        target="_blank"
        rel="noopener noreferrer"
        palette="alert"
    >
        Goto google.com ALERT
    </Anchor>

    <Anchor
        href="https://google.com"
        target="_blank"
        rel="noopener noreferrer"
        palette="affirmative"
    >
        Goto google.com AFFIRMATIVE
    </Anchor>

    <Anchor
        href="https://google.com"
        target="_blank"
        rel="noopener noreferrer"
        palette="negative"
    >
        Goto google.com NEGATIVE
    </Anchor>
</Stack>
snippets.title: Anchor Palette

data.render:
Anchor

Anchor are used for navigating from page to page, or to external websites.

Imports

<script>
    import {Anchor} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

Internal Navigation

When navigating only to an internal Web Application route, you can just set href property with no other properties.

External Navigation

When navigating to external links, for security purposes it's recommended to set rel="noopener" to prevent Window.opener from being set on the newly opened page. And also to set rel="noreferrer" for privacy purposes, to prevent the Browser from sending the Referer header to the new page.

Palette

You can change the color palette of the Anchor via the palette property.
